=====================================================

# Translation and Revision Services {#translation-and-revision-services}

**Notice ID:** cb-275-8029990

**Publication Date:** 2024-02-16

**Closing Date:** 2024-03-25T18:00:00

**Amendment:** 6

## Overview
---------------

Prairies Economic Development Canada (PrairiesCan) invites qualified suppliers to provide translation and revision services, including related services, for specific publications and information products. The products will be disseminated to external and internal audiences, in print and/or electronic formats, and will include policy position papers, discussion papers, reports, briefing notes, communication products, and other documents.

## Required Services
---------------------

*   Translation services from English to French (90%) and French to English (10%)
*   Comparative revision services
*   Related services, such as editing and proofreading

## Contract Information
------------------------

*   **Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01
*   **Contract End Date:** 2029-03-31
*   **Contract Term:** 5 years (1 standard and 4 option years)

## Evaluation Criteria
----------------------

The Task Authorization contracts will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contracting Entity
----------------------

Prairies Economic Development Canada, Suite 1500, Canada Place 9700 Jasper Avenue NW, Edmonton, Alberta, T5J 4H7, Canada

## Contact Information
-------------------------

*   Ryan Bent, (403) 921-7545, [ryan.bent@prairiescan.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.bent@prairiescan.gc.ca)
